titleInfo.title: B& F System, Inc. v. LeBlanc et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER directing counsel to retrieve necessary exhibits from the Macon courthouse no later than 5/31/2011 for the hearing on 6/1/2011 in Valdosta. Counsel will also be required to return the exhibits to Macon. Contact with Mary Beth Hand should be made not later than 5/26/2011 as to which exhibits will be moved to Valdosta and when they will be retrieved. Ordered by Judge Hugh Lawson on 5/24/2011. (nbp)

titleInfo.title: B& F System, Inc. v. LeBlanc et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER denying 296 Motion for Judgment as a Matter of Law; granting in part and denying in part 299 Motion for Statutory Damages; granting in part and denying in part 300 Motion for Permanent Injunction; granting in part and denying in part 303 Motion for Attorney Fees. Plaintiff's written election as to statutory damages is due by July 6, 2012. Final judgment will be entered as soon as the election is made. Ordered by Judge Hugh Lawson on June 29, 2012. (mbh)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 7:07-cv-00192; B& F System, Inc. v. LeBlanc et al;

extension.docketText: ORDER denying 296 Motion for Judgment as a Matter of Law; granting in part and denying in part 299 Motion for Statutory Damages; granting in part and denying in part 300 Motion for Permanent Injunction; granting in part and denying in part 303 Motion for Attorney Fees. Plaintiff's written election as to statutory damages is due by July 6, 2012. Final judgment will be entered as soon as the election is made. Ordered by Judge Hugh Lawson on June 29, 2012. (mbh)
